entry.title: White Victorian Bridal Hat with White Roses #506W
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Hats
Price: 84.99

Ladies White Victorian Touring Hat with white Roses. This is one of our designs from our first collection. It has been a best seller for many years. It has a white satin pleated top with white satin roses in front with white feathers and a white ribbon and white lace bow on the side. Finished off with a white English netting bow on the back..

entry.title: Small Ladies and Girls Victorian Tea Party Hat #200
entry.s:type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Girls Tea Party Dress Ups Hats
Price: 59.99

Small Ladies and Girls Designer Victorian Tea Party Hat Ivory fits both children or small adult with mauve Victorian hat. This hat is a smaller version of our Ladies Victorian Touring hat. Inside size of hat is 21". It has a pleated ivory satin top with petite mauve, light peach & lavender bouquet flowers in front with a light mauve feather and a satin ribbon bow on side. Finished off with an English netting bow on the back.

This hat is made just for you at the time of the order.  There are several steps involved in creating your hat that do require extra time such as hand dyeing and drying your embellishments plus the hand assembly.  These are made in the USA by a very talented artist that has carried on the creative talents of her mother.  This is not a hat that sits getting dusty on a shelf!  This is something special made just for you or your loved one as a gift she'll never forget! The turn around time for this process is usually 1-2 weeks but she is usually very quick.

entry.title: Ivory Victorian Bridal Hat #506
entry.summary:
Vendor: Elsie Massey
Type: Hats
Price: 82.99

Our Ladies Ivory Victorian Touring Hat has been a best seller for many years. It has an Ivory satin pleated top with silky large Ivory roses in front. It has Ivory feathers and a Ivory ribbon and lace bow on the side. It is finished off with a Ivory English netting bow on the back.
